item.title: HBO’s ’The Case Against Adnan Syed’ Finally Sets ‘Part Five’ Premiere Date — Watch the Trailer
item.description: The Amy Berg documentary series aired six years ago, and this epilogue episode was originally supposed to premiere in 2023.

item.title: Jeff Buckley Wants To Be Remembered for “Just The Music” in Late Singer’s ‘It’s Never Over’ Doc Trailer
item.description: The film, directed by Amy Berg, will hit theaters Aug. 8.
